verses.name: 2 Chronicles 29:1
verses.text: Hezekiah began to reign when he was five and twenty years old, and he reigned nine and twenty years in Jerusalem. And his mother’s name was Abijah, the daughter of Zechariah.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 29:2
verses.text: And he did that which was right in the sight of the Lord, according to all that David his father had done.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 29:3
verses.text: He in the first year of his reign, in the first month, opened the doors of the house of the Lord, and repaired them.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 29:4
verses.text: And he brought in the priests and the Levites, and gathered them together into the east street,
